title: 81/775/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 September 1981 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in France pursuant to Council Directive 72/160/EEC (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 September 1981 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in France pursuant to Council Directive 72/160/EEC (Only the French text is authentic) (81/775/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions for the implementation of Directive 72/160/EEC forwarded by the French Government continue, in the light of the provisions specified in the recitals, to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 6 of Directive 72/160/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 September 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 9.
